switchy.teleport.module.last_location.de: A module that switches the location of the player.
switchy.teleport.module.last_location.en: You will have a separate tracked location for each preset.
switchy.teleport.module.last_location.di: Your location wont be tracked per-preset; you will not be teleported when switching.
switchy.teleport.module.last_location.wa: All saved locations will be IMMEDIATELY lost. This is irreversible.
switchy.teleport.module.spawn_point.desc: A module that switches the spawn point of the player.
switchy.teleport.module.spawn_point.enab: You will have separate spawn points per-preset.
switchy.teleport.module.spawn_point.disa: You will share a single spawn point across all presets.
switchy.teleport.module.spawn_point.warn: All other spawn points will be IMMEDIATELY lost. This is irreversible.
